channel.title: Jachère, Brache, Fallow
channel.description: Jachère means fallow means Brache. A little corner of the internet that is freed of economic reasoning, instead trying to root and entangle itself with the local and being environmentally aware.

item.title: Release - Fallow Zine 1
item.description: This is the first Fallow Zine, a small zine that sprang forth from La Jachère. So, let's dive in. Get yourself comfy, and let us collaboratively refuse the onslaught of technology. Have a tea, eat some cookies, enjoy the moment.

item.title: Isopods!
item.description: The Jachère now officially hosts some isopods. Since small critters are amongst the main inhabitants of a fallow/Brache/jachère they absolutely deserve their own entry on this website… Isopods are fantastic. They are really old and they don't give a crap about your opinions.

item.title: Jachère Solar Setup
item.description: This entry outlines the current hardware and solar power setup of this tiny server.

item.title: Call for entries - Fallow Zine 1
item.description: For the first Fallow Zine, la Jachère is interested in contributions about the following topics, but not limited to them: Lazy tech or tech for the lazies. Tech that falls into place, fits, is just enough. Tech for rest, pause, have a break, take a breath Tech for preservation, of the status quo, of energy, of a moment, of equilibrium.
